alert.note: Alert for Pribilof Islands (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 25 at 2:30PM AKST until January 26 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 9 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. Visibility reduced to one half mile at times. * WHERE...Pribilof Islands. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 9 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A band of precipitation and gusty winds reaches the Pribilof Islands late tonight. Precipitation will start initially as snow and will transition to rain late morning. Visibilities will be reduced to one half mile at times due to blowing snow. Winds are expected to diminish through the afternoon hours on Thursday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
